code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{doc,getDoc}from'firebase/firestore';import{db}from'../firebase';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TrackStatus(){const[requestId,setRequestId]=useState('');const[status,setStatus]=useState('');const checkStatus=async()=>{const docRef=doc(db,'requests',requestId);const docSnap=await getDoc(docRef);if(docSnap.exists()){setStatus(docSnap.data().status);}else{setStatus('Request not found');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Track Request"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:requestId,onChange:e=>setRequestId(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your request ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:checkStatus,children:"Check Status"}),status&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"message",children:["Status: ",status]})]});}
